services.name: automated-annotation
services.description: Automated annotation service using LangChain for knowledge extraction and text annotation

endpoints.description: Extract knowledge from text using automated annotation

body.text: string (required) - Text to extract knowledge from
body.extraction_type: string (optional) - Type of extraction (entities, relationships, attributes)

endpoints.description: Annotate text with structured data using automated annotation
Health check endpoint for the automated annotation service
